name: Soother
0:
”Alexa Ask Soothing Guide to give me a vision tip”
”Give me a tip for smell”
”lets breathe together”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soothing guide
des:
Self-soothing techniques are a good way of distracting or grounding you when feeling anxious. 
The Soother skill has a list of tips or techniques for vision, sound, touch, smell, or general anxiety. You can also perform a deep breathing exercise with Alexa
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
